introPayAsYouGo.title: Your only committment is to yourself
introPayAsYouGo.subtitle: Try!
introPayAsYouGo.content: Not ready for a membership package? Our pay-as-you-go timetable allows you to commit to your fitness goals at your convenience without a contract. Call us now to book your spot:  079 837 3780

introSunbed.title: Tan your way to summer!

introSunbed.content: 10 sun sessions for R400! Call us now to book your spot:  079 837 3780
